roundover.callout: Great Job! Chunk has more friends on the way!

mainmenu.callout:
Help Chunk outfit his
ZhuZhu friends in style!

help-mobile: Tap a ZhuZhu to see what outfit they want.
Tap a rack to choose clothing from it.
Here's what you're holding. You can hold four things.
Tap your friends to give them clothing you're holding.
Use the laundry tube to get rid of stuff you don't need.
